channel.title: Comments on: How to Make Simple Plant-Based Meals

item.title: By: Katrin Perish
item.dc:creator: Katrin Perish
item.description: We realised we really wanted to catch a glimpse of what went on behind the scenes of the companies we looked up to. And we thought other people would want to know too.
item.content:encoded: We realised we really wanted to catch a glimpse of what went on behind the scenes of the companies we looked up to. And we thought other people would want to know too.

item.title: By: Chriss Moore
item.dc:creator: Chriss Moore
item.description: So we decided to organise an event to share these stories. Today, we run monthly Show & Tell events and an annual conference.
item.content:encoded: So we decided to organise an event to share these stories. Today, we run monthly Show & Tell events and an annual conference.
